title: There is One of Everything in the World
description: Many years after flooding wipes out most of the life on Earth, Haiyugen and his son, Baboogen, are lost at sea. The island they come from has the last remaining people in the world on it, but the ocean is immense and their island is like a drop of water in it.Will they ever see their family and friends again?The father and son set out on an epic adventure to make their way home that will give them enough stories to last a lifetime.Take some time out to read a stunning debut novel from an inspirational, young writer.Available to buy on all major eBook sites.
author: A.T. MacDonnacha
